name: Cute timer app : Parrot Timer
description: Cute kitchen timer app of parrots.   Features - A cute parrot has appeared in timer window, the parrot will start dancing when the time has come. - Five parrots are available ibydefault . You might get new parrots if you use Parrot Timer a lot. - Parrot timer is not only cute, but easy to use as a kitchen timer.  * Prrot Timer is designed for kitchen timer. But the app can be used as normal timer.
